website_summaries.verdict: Simple and functional 6-mug/cup countertop holder that comes in 3 metallic finishes.
pros: Simple, discreet design on this space-saving cup/mug holder, which is solidly constructed of steel
It's a way to display your favorite mugs, or it can be used to hold bracelets, smaller pieces of jewelry, etc
cons: May not be enough room for large cups/mugs on the lower 2 holder rungs (they touch the counter)

customer_reviews.title: Hey this sucker is great. It is extremely sturdy and accommodates very large ...
customer_reviews.text: Hey this sucker is great. It is extremely sturdy and accommodates very large mugs and espresso cups alike. It is easy to remove and place mugs without clinking them. I included a roll of paper towels in the picture to give you some idea of its size.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant and space saver! I wasn't sure if ...
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant and space saver! I wasn't sure if my big cups would fit on it, but it did perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Neutral

customer_reviews.title: Mug trees for 8 are so hard to find, thank goodness for this item!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality brushed stainless item that we bought with some of our wedding money. It's made very well, supports heavy mugs, "branches" are evenly spaced on the "trunk", I'm a very picky consumer and could not find any complaint about this item! It is a great value and holds more than the typical 4- or 6-mug trees on the market. Very happy to have found this one with simple lines / style that will blend in with any decor.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mug tree, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice mug tree. Love the size of it and the nickel finish, plus it holds several good size mugs. Very sleek and modern looking, goes great with stainless steel especially. The only reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5 is because of the packing. The box was way too large for this item and should have had a lot of bubble-wrap or something else substantial around the tree, instead of one longish piece of paper and the plastic bag the tree came in. Lucky for me the mug tree arrived in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Did the job beautifully - the mugs fit just right
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the lobby area at work. We have over-sized, personalized mugs and wanted to clear up some space so it looked organized and less cluttered. Did the job beautifully - the mugs fit just right. A bonus is that it's sturdy, solid and looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fits all size mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I have a weird assortment of mugs. Some big, some small, some very oddly shaped. This is able to hold all with out issues! No wobbling, pretty sturdy. The mugs do kind of overlap each other, but that’s to be expected since they’re all very different sizes. But I feel very comfortable keeping my mugs there. Very happy with my purchase! I’ve had this item for about a month now
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Great Tree
customer_reviews.text: I really, really liked this mug tree. It was intended as a partial new house gift but, knowing the kitchen, I decided it was much too big for the counter space available. The first clue should have been that it holds 8 mugs. It is very sturdy and I'm sure it would never tip over even with mugs on one side. I gave it 5 stars because it ticked all the boxes even though I returned it because of its size. I would definitely recommend this holder if you have the room for it - besides, you'd never get one of this quality at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Map

customer_reviews.title: Completed my coffee bar!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this. It spruces up my “coffee bar” and has freed up a ton of space in my cabinet. It also allows my houseguests to help themselves. I am able to hang 6 large coffee mugs - hanging on every rung except the bottom two bc they are too close to the counter.
customer_reviews.author: shoelova

customer_reviews.title: Not Made for Decent Sized Coffee Cups
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm... This is supposed to fit eight coffee mugs, but the branches were way too shallow for decent sized coffee mugs. I agree with the ad regarding jewelry - seems to be made more for hanging necklaces. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: The best I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have the six cup for several years and now bought the 8 cup ...very stable with heavy mugs. Doesn't tip!! Love the old one. Still looks like the day we bought it from a store. Beautiful, indestructible, looks aserviceability. Doesn't wobble or tip ever. This one is same. Great value too. 5 dollars less than I paid for 6 cup. Thrilled to see it! Highly recommend for years of servicability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the photos, can hold eight pretty heavy mugs, and looks great on my counter! My only negative comments would be that it came wrapped kind of haphazardly and was slightly bent when I unpacked it. I was able to straighten it out with just a tiny bit of pressure, but got worried I was gonna break it! It was able to bend without breaking at all though, so it must be well-made. Great space saver and displays my mugs!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Ludington

customer_reviews.title: Nice but----
customer_reviews.text: This tree is what we wanted, and would be perfect if it was not crooked. That is why I gave it only 3 stars as it drives my hubby crazy cause it does not stand straight.
customer_reviews.author: bigheart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a very strong and sturdy stand for my mugs. It's a lot heavier than it looks, and I was surprised by that. The only thing I don't care for is that my mugs bang against each other when I remove or place on on the rack. It's a small thing, but over all I love this stand.
customer_reviews.author: KA Wright

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy good looking mug tree!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new mug tree! It's very sturdy and clean-looks great in the kitchen! It even holds my oversized mugs, which is nice because I free up some cabinet space! Well worth the $12! It came in a huge box with lots of plastic bubbles to protect it unlike the review with just the paper. It won't let me upload any pictures here though. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Quinn Krueger

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Was almost going to return it looking at the huge size and weight - however I changed my mind after actually hanging the mugs. It couldn't be any smaller or lighter. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dhanashri

customer_reviews.title: It’s waaaaaay taller than I thought...but really really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this mug tree! I have been looking for one for a while and finally settled on this one because it looked modern. The only thing I wasn’t expecting was that it would be so tall and would not fit under my cabinets above the countertop. So, I had to find another place for it because I refuse to send it back because it’s such a nice quality one. So FYI if you have low cabinets, you might not want to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: S Baker

customer_reviews.title: Turn coffee mugs into art - High quality countertop storage
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Holds large mugs. Doesn't wobble - well built and high quality. Small footprint so very efficient use of space. Brushed finish means no fingerprints show. Best of all, my pretty and unusual collection of mugs become kitchen art and my cabinets have more room for the other (less interesting or attractive) dishes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: VLH

customer_reviews.title: Holds even large mugs but...
customer_reviews.text: The second one I received is presented just like it looks. The first one was broken, and I had to send back. Seems like other have that problem. This one holds even large sized mugs though so if you are lucky enough to get a whole one, works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy mug tower
customer_reviews.text: Love having my mugs hanging on this stand on the counter next to my keurig. Definitely saves valuable cabinet storage as well. I was worried it may not be super sturdy but it stays in place and holds the mugs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Potts

customer_reviews.title: Well-built and appears to be worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for a mug tree that would not tip over and that would fit on the section of my counter known as "the beverage station". This mug holder is heavy, solidly built and appears to be a high quality chrome. At the moment I have four 10 ounce mugs hanging on it but could add more. The style is so basic it goes with any decor - unless you are into brass or Victoriana.
customer_reviews.author: disneynut59

customer_reviews.title: Not in great condition
customer_reviews.text: I knew going in that the specific mug rag I purchased had an imperfection on the top. No biggie. What I didn’t know was that the bottom was not level and it wobbles. It has breakable ceramic mugs on it so that’s not ideal. It also doesn’t fit under my cabinets, but that’s on me for not measuring. It sort of works and I think I can fix it. It’s not my favorite thing that I’ve ever gotten off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pihl

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE this
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, strong and stylish. Looks good on my counter, and holds heavy mugs!! This is my first time buying something like this and I'm not disappointed. Thank you!! I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beautifulgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great mugg tree
customer_reviews.text: I used this tree during the holidays to hold the egg nog mugs. It takes up much less space than placing the mugs on the counter top. It is very sturdy and attractive with my other dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A Grisham

customer_reviews.title: Super Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a decorative piece but it's actually very functional. It's super sturdy, I trust our glass mugs won't fall off of it. It looks really good when you stack mugs on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It’s given my kitchen (coffee station) a beautiful look. Could have been a lil cheaper whoops
customer_reviews.author: Ishan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Well-constructed with a satin finish light "pewter" look. The mug holder's slightly taller, staggered hook design allows for more and larger mug storage without tipping (may be too tall to fit on counters with low upper cabinets). Mugs are close together, but they do hang. We placed it next to Keurig things for easy reach, one-stop beverage station on counter. Excellent alternative product for people who find it difficult to reach upper cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Mim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to hold heavy ornaments!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold some Polish pottery ornaments that were too heavy for a small tree. With a star on top, this has become my kitchen "Christmas tree". The holder itself is very stable and sturdy. Although I don't use it for mugs, it seems like it would serve that purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Grifsy

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mug holder that compliments my new Nespresso coffee maker. The overall design and chrome look is very clean. This is a great piece to anyone looking to set up a coffee bar station at home or in a small office.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo M

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality!! Holds all sizes of mugs, no matter how heavy!
customer_reviews.text: This mug holder is both beautiful AND VERY STURDY. Its capacity for holding large, heavy mugs is very good. It does not tilt when you take one off of it. It was an Amazon pick, and they did very well with this product. I actually paid less than I would have for such a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the counter
customer_reviews.text: I needed a coffee cup holder for the counter and did not want to spend that much money. This product was more than I expected. I have big heavy cups and this is holding up perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works with all mug sizes!
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done! It works with my oversized mugs and my normal size mugs, so I am a fan! I wish that it rotated, but it’s honestly not that big of an inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: alyssa sibley

customer_reviews.title: It’s Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and sturdy with fast shipping. It is too much for my counter top. Would work great for a work space to organize cups.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice mug holder
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. The one thing I would add would be something non slip on the base. When it's on slick granite counters, it really slides around.
customer_reviews.author: C. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Amazon replaced it with a new one and we're happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Kind of big and heavy. And the first one arrived broken. The top-most hooks had fallen off. Amazon replaced it with a new one and we're happy with it. It holds 8 mugs of pretty much whatever size you've got and it looks good doing it. Not much else to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Missus or Mr.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver for coffeee mugs!
customer_reviews.text: Great and sturdy coffee mug holder. Very streamlined and sturdy it fits 8 mugs, most others only fit 6. My mugs are fairly large and they fit nicely. The mug holder is very streamlined and I put it in corner of kitchen counter and it's out of the way freeing up some valuable cabinet space!
customer_reviews.author: Pichuza49

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this is that the bottom two hooks are too close to the counter. I can only put certain mugs there and they still touch the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just as intended, my coffee bar is so not cluttered anymore. It looks much nicer than before. I was worried that the varying sizes of the cups would look awkward, but it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cup holder for display in craft shows. We were surprised how attractive it is. A very good design.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Wilber

customer_reviews.title: Clean deisgn that looks good in any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It is a great coffee mug holder that can free up some much needed cabinet space. The only reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars is because it is only suited for "standard" sized coffee mugs with the way the arms are spaced. Any over-sized or oddly shaped mugs don't hang quite right.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work for mason jars like I was hoping, but I've got that thing FULL of coffee cups! Taking the coffee cups out of the cupboard made room for my mason jars to go in there, so it all works out :)
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: its a sturdy mug tree, however..
customer_reviews.text: Some mugs tend to be a bit too big for the tree. It would be better if the branches were a bit further apart than they are, to facilitate larger mugs. It still works for its purpose, just have to be careful to not chip mugs against each other.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the break room at my job. So everyone can have a set place for their coffee mugs. This stand exceeded my expectations!! It is heavy but not to heavy an sturdy. The finish on it is really nice. Fast shipping (prime). Will definitely order again if I ever needed to.
customer_reviews.author: mcs26

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, steady as a rock
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, holds lots of mugs, and is very stable, won't tip over. Good value. Glad I chose it.
customer_reviews.author: Manhattan Marian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small cup holder for my coffee bar and this stand met my needs. It is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: VHenry

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my coffee bar. It's sturdy and holds my mugs that have a decent weight without bending under the pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Janiesha

customer_reviews.title: Well made coffee mug stand.
customer_reviews.text: The mug stand looks great. It holds large mugs perfectly and has plenty of hooks but is well made so as not to be top heavy. It is thick metal but still is very stylish. We have lots of coffee mugs and it displays them beautifully. Perfect for kitchen counter to return space to your cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute and sleek mug holder!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mug rack! It is very durable but also sleek and cute on my counter top. It holds all of my mugs which can be quite heavy and I’m never worried about it tipping over. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Braunagel

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very rugged and holding up well even with larger and heavier mugs. Very easy to clean. A good buy for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sneha Tammineedi

customer_reviews.title: Disappears from sight when full of mugs
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to get mugs off and on, agreeable appearance, doesn't topple.
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I’m making small changes in the kitchen. This is really nice on my counter now I’m searching for some beautiful mugs
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my Mara mugs-they fit perfectly and the stand is very sturdy, so I don’t worry about it tipping over from the weight of the mugs and causing damage.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great Mug Tree
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and beautiful! Accommodates large mugs. Excellent for the price. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A.

customer_reviews.title: Not Steady; Wobbles
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first unit I got because the base was quite warped and the unit couldn't stand up straight. The second unit I got is better, but the base still isn't flat and causes the unit to wobble and shake. Disappointing that both units have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: I can't think of a name.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A little too tall, won't fit under cabinet on counter top
customer_reviews.author: Patrcia Law

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product is much stronger and sturdier than I expected. It is a great size and holds mugs well placed and well balanced. I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: TreetopNTn

customer_reviews.title: Thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This mug holder it perfect. It is very thick, not so heavy and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Strong holder
customer_reviews.text: A very strong cup holder. Holds a lot of mugs without tipping.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: It is great for what it does, my hard part is we bought it to save room on cup storage and it now takes up a large portion of our non-existent counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rapatz

customer_reviews.title: Great place to hold my coffee and tea mugs
customer_reviews.text: Sits next to my Keurig coffee maker and holds my mugs for coffee or tea
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new place to put our mugs, and this was the best idea ever! It looks super cute in our kitchen and it’s convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Franksmomma

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: better than i expected! holds well, even if all cups are on one side! doesnt tip over! love it!
customer_reviews.author: cherbear

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, don’t be afraid that it will tip over.
customer_reviews.text: Holds 8 mugs easily. No tipping over, no bending of the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Bouvy

customer_reviews.title: I would give it 5 stars except I wish the ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars except I wish the bottom hooks were up higher. My cups on the bottom touch the counter
customer_reviews.author: Ren Glaze

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive mug tree
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mug tree. Attractive design. Holds 8 mugs easily and is very stable whether or not it's full. Does not take up much space on the counter. 4 months in use and the chrome is untarnished.
customer_reviews.author: Kay S

customer_reviews.title: FITS VERY LARGE MUGS
customer_reviews.text: First one i received was bent.. So I returned it and ordered another one.. The second one is perfect! It fits large mugs and the color is really nice. very well made.
customer_reviews.author: name

customer_reviews.title: Hold my mugs
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for years. It holds my mugs pretty well. However, it got rusty at the bottom. I guess I couldn’t complain about the quality since it’s cheap
customer_reviews.author: Peace0857$

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. I hate having to search for coffee mugs. But this allows my mugs to sit beside my Keurig & display my cute mugs lol.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Roberson

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful , nice , and useful!! What else can I say !!?? I really like it !!
customer_reviews.author: Luke04

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It holds 8 mugs on it's sturdy, contemporary, lovelyness......
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice. It can hold up to 8 cups.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe.L

customer_reviews.title: What my coffee station needed.
customer_reviews.text: Holds just the right amount of mugs and fits my coffee station just right.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Bettenhausen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I actually use it as a keychain stand in a shop I sell from. It’s super sturdy and I don’t have to worry about anyone bumping it and having it fall over
customer_reviews.author: Browensgifts

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money I spent
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would say this but I really like the esthetics of this Spectrum diversified Euro mug holder. Bought a couple of these holders before but this one by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: M. Oda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Simple and functional, but elevates the storage and presentation of my mugs
customer_reviews.author: Old Country

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh! this is the most useful thing! it stands so straight and NO tilting! it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MVP

customer_reviews.title: Holds Various Sized Mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s very sturdy and holds various sized mugs. It’s a tad bulky but it does the job while looking nice. Glad I got it for our coffee bar area!!
customer_reviews.author: Rocknerd

customer_reviews.title: Space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to store mugs! Holds 8 mugs, including large and oddly shaped ones.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie F.

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy value
customer_reviews.text: This will last the rest of your life. Can hold up to 6 to 8 mugs, depending on their size.
customer_reviews.author: kramarpie

customer_reviews.title: Holds large mugs nicely
customer_reviews.text: Holds large mugs quite nicely & is a big help to store and display them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Alson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, perfect for big mugs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hold large mugs and its perfect. It's sturdy, substantial, and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love this mug holder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mug holder! It very nicely holds several mugs of different sizes. I added a small piece of padding to the bottoms because I hate the sound of it moving across the tile and was afraid it might scratch my brand new counters.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, simple design
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy holder has a small footprint and nicely holds larger mugs (12-16 oz. capacity). The mugs that size do touch each other, but I don't see that as a negative.
customer_reviews.author: Tippy Claire

customer_reviews.title: Too tall
customer_reviews.text: It’s too tall, be carful where you want to put it
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Cup Holder Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Tried others thru the years but nothing held up! I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Neudek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!❤
customer_reviews.text: I just received this mug holder. I am totally in love with it. It is sturdy, gorgeous and is a perfect space saver for my small apartment. Thank you! I'm so excited over my new coffee mug holder!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Foit

customer_reviews.title: Love this! ❤
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I looked locally and online for a while till I found this. It’s study so it doesn’t matter if you put heavy mugs on the top or bottom. Fits into a small space. And looks adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Lindeman

customer_reviews.title: Love this mug holder
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my coffee mugs, secure, and looks great on the counter top
customer_reviews.author: Judy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's strong and sleek. Holds 8 cups and it's pretty on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Spectrum Diversified Euro Mug Holder and I love it!! It's not cheap and is very sturdy!! I have it sitting in a little corner on my kitchen counter with the mugs I bought to hang on it and it looks great. Very good buy. I'd highly recommend it to anyone looking for a mug holder.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry White

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and sturdy. Nickel finish fits in perfectly with my kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely look my new cup tree!! Very attractive and sturdy. Nickel finish fits in perfectly with my kitchen appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Very well made. Even bigger than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Great color and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about the color because I don't like shiny silver. This is a soft color not tacky looking and big and sturdy. Better than I expected. I totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of reviews complaining that their item was broken/etc and I can attest that the product was very poorly packaged for shipping and I'm lucky mine was in OK condition. Good for the price, better for smaller sized mugs I would say.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Fillman

customer_reviews.title: SLEEK, AND GREAT VALUE FOR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: Most mug holders hold 4 or 6 cups max. I was so glad to have found this that hold 8 and doesn't cost a fortune. I saw a similar one at Bed Bath and Beyond that held 8 and went for $75. This is a really good value for the money you are paying and it looks great on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Large mugs fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love this rack! My 15 oz mugs fit perfectly. I could not hang them on the bottom hooks but I only have 6 mugs so not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Nice looking and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My mom has 8 Starbucks cups that have different cities on them. She can proudly display them all on this very sturdy coffee tree. It's strong and stable and looks pretty streamlined. I recommend it for anyone's countertop.
customer_reviews.author: IamAconsumer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good looking
customer_reviews.text: The mug tree holds all of my mugs and is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Dollins

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very much needed to organize my mugs. Nice size and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: LouLou1355

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heavy duty product..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and was very pleasantly surprised. It was much larger than i was thinking and holds heavy cups.. I am very happy and satisfied!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price!! Strong, heavy, sturdy and you don’t have to assemble!!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Spectrum Diversified Euro Large 8-Mug Holder, Countertop Mug Tree, Coffee Mugs & Tea Cup Storage Rack, Coffee Counter Bar Accessory & Kitchen Organizer
product_meta.description: Color:Satin NickelFree up valuable cupboard space with Euro 8-Mug Holder from Spectrum. The mug tree holds up to eight of your favorite coffee mugs or teacups, and each branch tilts upwards to hold each mug securely. Create a countertop coffee station with the mug holder, or clear up cabinet space by moving extra mugs to your counter. Display your collection of teacups, or store your glass or ceramic coffee mugs on the counter. Mug tree holds cups by the handles, so the holder can accommodate a variety of cup sizes at once. The solid steel base sits evenly on the table without tipping or leaning. The clean, curved lines and fresh finishes look at home in a modern kitchen, yet the looped handle fits into a traditional design scheme. Equipped with stoppers on the end of the arms, the mug tree does not allow cups to slide off. The looped handle makes it easy to move the mug holder from your kitchen countertop coffee station to a hot chocolate station in your dining room and back again. Organize your tea supplies and coffee accessories near your mugs for easy access to your morning cup. Made of sturdy steel.
feature_bullets: INTRODUCE MODERN STYLE: With clean, smooth lines, this organizer inspires an up-to-date look that is fresh and contemporary. The modern finishes complement a variety of kitchen styles and color schemes, showing off your style in the best light.

HOLDS MUGS OF VARIOUS SIZES & SHAPES: Cups hang on the mug tree by the handle, accommodating any size of ceramic or glass coffee or teacup. Branches curve upwards to keep mugs securely in place. Create a countertop coffee station by keeping your mugs within easy reach, right next to the coffee machine or French press.

ORGANIZE YOUR COUNTERTOPS: Streamline your cabinets by relocating your mug collection to your countertops. Show off your favorite mugs without clutter. Store mugs vertically on this tree to save counter and cabinet space.

CONVENIENT CARRYING HANDLE: Move from countertop to coffee station and back again with the convenient carrying handle. The looped top is a stylish way to transport the mug tree from one place to another.
EASY CARE: To clean, wipe down with a damp cloth and towel dry as needed.
